query:
SELECT
            COUNT(*) as usage_count,
            COALESCE(SUM(total_input_tokens + total_output_tokens), 0)::bigint as total_tokens
        FROM
            usage u
        JOIN
            users usr ON u.user_id = usr.user_id
        WHERE
            usr.email = $1
            AND date_trunc('month', u.created_at) = date_trunc('month', now())
